Class SpiLoader.LoaderBuilder<T>

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.spi.SpiLoader.LoaderBuilder<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the type of instances to be loaded by SpiLoader.
Enclosing class:
SpiLoader<T>
public static final class SpiLoader.LoaderBuilder<T> extends Object
LoaderBuilder is a helper class to configure and construct an instance of SpiLoader. It allows setting a custom class loader, a predicate for filtering instances, and a default supplier for fallback instances.

  • Method Details

    • classLoader

      public SpiLoader.LoaderBuilder<T> classLoader(ClassLoader cl)
      Sets the class loader for this LoaderBuilder. Ensures that the class loader is set only once.
      Parameters:
      cl - the ClassLoader to be used
      Returns:
      the updated LoaderBuilder instance

    • accept

      public SpiLoader.LoaderBuilder<T> accept(Predicate<T> predicate)
      Sets a predicate for filtering instances of type T. This method ensures that the predicate is only set once by throwing an exception if it is already set.
      Parameters:
      predicate - a Predicate to filter the instances.
      Returns:
      the current instance of LoaderBuilder with the predicate set.

    • defaultSupplier

      public SpiLoader.LoaderBuilder<T> defaultSupplier(Supplier<? extends T> defaultSupplier)
      Sets the default supplier for fallback instances.
      Parameters:
      defaultSupplier - a Supplier that provides fallback instances of type T
      Returns:
      the current LoaderBuilder instance with the updated default supplier

    • build

      public SpiLoader<T> build()
      Constructs and returns a new instance of SpiLoader configured with the specified type, class loader, predicate, and default supplier.
      Returns:
      a new instance of SpiLoader configured based on the builder's current state
